question_content.barrons:question: It seems ironic that Elizabethâ€™s rejection, intended to discourage her importunate suitor, served only to ________ his ardor.
question_content.barrons:explanation:
increase; reinforce.

Ironic is an implicit contrast signal word. It indicates that something unexpected, even unwanted, has taken place. Elizabeth has rejected her suitor. She intends that her rejection will discourage him. Instead, her rejection increases or reinforces (strengthens) his passion.

Impede is incorrect. Impede (hinder; block) makes no sense in the context.

Diminish is incorrect. Diminish (lessen) makes no sense in the context.

Check is incorrect. Check (curb; stop) makes no sense in the context.

Dampen is incorrect. Dampen (depress; deaden) makes no sense in the context.
